No. 0-42011/APC/Circular/AS/06 ~ 7766 Dated jg Aug 2006

GIRCULAR No. AS- 13/2006

Of late, it has been observed that the unit commanders are sanctioning
leave to the personnel along with joining time while relieving them on regular
transfers/postings. This results in a lot of administrative inconvenience since
these personnel do not report to their new units in time and the latter, in turn,
are unable to relieve the dues out personnel or face shortage of manpower for
lack of timely (dues in) replacements.

In view of the above, it is hereby directed that henceforth, no leave of any
kind should be granted to personnel being posted out by the respective
unit commanders with joining time. All personnel are expected to fulfill their
personal obligations during the joining time due to them. Further leave, if
desired, should be applied for at their new unit(s) after they report therein. In
exceptional cases of genuine and extreme emergency, the unit commanders
should consult/refer the matter to this Headquarters with their specific
recommendation in each case. In any case, leave should not be granted till a
decision is conveyed from this end. This is effective immediately.

Please acknowledge receipt and ensure strict compliance.
